assetProfile.address2: 5th Floor Mubarak Al Kabeer Street Sharq
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Kuwait Investment Company K.S.C.P., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of various investment and financial services. The company operates through four segments: Asset Management, Direct Investments and Corporate Finance, Treasury, and Other Operations. It offers portfolio management services, which include customized portfolio management services, access to IPOs, local, regional, and international fund management. The company also provides fund management services that comprise a range of investment products based on the foundations and global indicators; direct investment services that manages and monitors a diversified portfolio of mid to long-term direct investments; and manages strategic investments, lending, real estate, and rental activities. In addition, it offers treasury services that consist of foreign exchange trading and money market activities; and provides online trading services, through its platform KIC Trade. The company was incorporated in 1961 and is headquartered in Kuwait City, Kuwait. Kuwait Investment Company K.S.C.P. operates as a subsidiary of Kuwait Investment Authority.
